description:
For Itsuka`s birthday, Nagomu uses his "Going Somewhere Together" ticket and takes her to Hirakata Park. While out with Nagomu, Itsuka`s remembers when she went to the park with her father.
When they get back to Ryokushou, they find a wagashi cake and birthday party for Itsuka waiting for them.
Itsuka always seems to be chasing after the shadow of her father. Concerned, Nagomu comforts her. And in reply to Nagomu`s words, Itsuka...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Red Sea Bream for a Spring Dawn
